content: द्वितीय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Second; त्वं जीवितं त्वमसि मे हृदयं द्वितीयं <ls>U. 3. 26</ls>; <ls>Me. 83</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 49.</ls> --यः {@--1@} The second in a family, a son {@--2@} A companion, partner, friend; (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); प्रयतपरिग्रहद्वितीयः <ls>R. 1. 95</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 35</ls>; so छाया°, दुःख° &c. {@--3@} The second letter of a class. {@--4@} The second person (in <ab>gram.</ab>). --या {@--1@} The second day of a lunar fortnight. {@--2@} A wife, companion, partner. {@--3@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The accusative case. --यं The half. --यं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A second time, again.
